roleset.name: uninformed

role.descr: subject matter arg1 is uninformed about

example.name: arg1
example.text: Several of us A2K'ers have created a support group to painlessly guide you towards appearing knowledgeable even if , like many of us , you are clueless .

example.name: both args
example.text: My child is clueless about what he wants to do when he grows up.
example.arg: about what he wants to do when he grows up.

roleset.note: CLUELESS-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. (from clueless.01-j)
